pullRequest.body:
fixing `abstractNestedProofs`

---
<!-- The text above the `---` will become the commit message when your
PR is merged. Please leave a blank newline before the `---`, otherwise
GitHub will format the text above it as a title.

For details on the "pull request lifecycle" in mathlib, please see:
https://leanprover-community.github.io/contribute/index.html

In particular, note that most reviewers will only notice your PR
if it passes the continuous integration checks.
Please ask for help on https://leanprover.zulipchat.com if needed.

To indicate co-authors, include lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Co-authored-by: Author Name <author@email.com>

If you are moving or deleting declarations, please include these lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Moves:
- Vector.* -> List.Vector.*
- ...

Deletions:
- Nat.bit1_add_bit1
- ...

Any other comments you want to keep out of the PR commit should go
below the `---`, and placed outside this HTML comment, or else they
will be invisible to reviewers.

If this PR depends on other PRs, please list them below this comment,
using the following format:
- [ ] depends on: #abc [optional extra text]
- [ ] depends on: #xyz [optional extra text]

-->

[![Open in Gitpod](https://gitpod.io/button/open-in-gitpod.svg)](https://gitpod.io/from-referrer/)

### PR summary [dd56d64a40](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/pull/22613/commits/dd56d64a4016e9db37ec8e28bc9ae47ac3cf62fc)

#### Import changes for modified files

No significant changes to the import graph


<details><summary>Import changes for all files</summary>

|Files|Import difference|
|-|-|

</details>

---

<details><summary>

#### Declarations diff

</summary>

`+ toNat_lt''`
`- toNat_le`
`- toNat_lt'`
<details>
  <summary>You can run this locally as follows</summary>


```bash
## summary with just the declaration names:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh <optional_commit>

## more verbose report:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh long <optional_commit>
```
</details>

The doc-module for `script/declarations_diff.sh` contains some details about this script.

</details>

---

<details><summary>Increase in tech debt: (relative, absolute) = (1.00, 0.01)</summary>

|Current number|Change|Type|
|-:|:-:|:-|
|99|1|adaptation notes|

Current commit [dd56d64a40](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/commit/dd56d64a4016e9db37ec8e28bc9ae47ac3cf62fc)
Reference commit [1fb7412a49](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/commit/1fb7412a49749178a1aa78376901054bc7b7d5b4)

You can run this locally as
```
./scripts/technical-debt-metrics.sh pr_summary
```
* The `relative` value is the weighted *sum* of the differences with weight given by the *inverse* of the current value of the statistic.
* The `absolute` value is the `relative` value divided by the total sum of the inverses of the current values (i.e. the weighted *average* of the differences).
</details>

Here are the [benchmark results](https://speed.lean-lang.org/mathlib4/run-detail/6ada7c26-06e5-4678-bd35-353c7d8d1164) for commit 39c29e11575f8557667da236b7aaa7883367b72a.
There were [significant changes](https://speed.lean-lang.org/mathlib4/compare/6c078c32-143a-4078-89be-7a9de6bf7008/to/6ada7c26-06e5-4678-bd35-353c7d8d1164) against commit dc26fc02df4023439f1359ce63a1b7c2ed6cc79d:
```diff
  Benchmark                                                Metric                    Change
  =========================================================================================
- build                                                    process pre-definitions     5.5%
+ ~Mathlib.Algebra.Homology.BifunctorShift                 instructions              -11.8%
+ ~Mathlib.AlgebraicTopology.SimplicialNerve               instructions              -15.0%
+ ~Mathlib.CategoryTheory.Comma.StructuredArrow.CommaMap   instructions              -10.0%
+ ~Mathlib.CategoryTheory.Limits.Cones                     instructions               -4.2%
+ ~Mathlib.CategoryTheory.Localization.Trifunctor          instructions               -9.4%
+ ~Mathlib.CategoryTheory.Whiskering                       instructions               -4.3%
```

source.title: fix: `abstractNestedProofs` should see into the head of an application

nodes.body:
Here are the [benchmark results](https://speed.lean-lang.org/mathlib4/run-detail/3ee21d9b-69a4-4a0f-972d-cfa34587a6a5) for commit 5866b43802f6bbb60af8707e8896ad0d9159924a.
There were [significant changes](https://speed.lean-lang.org/mathlib4/compare/6c078c32-143a-4078-89be-7a9de6bf7008/to/3ee21d9b-69a4-4a0f-972d-cfa34587a6a5) against commit dc26fc02df4023439f1359ce63a1b7c2ed6cc79d:
```diff

  ==============================================================================
+ ~Mathlib.Algebra.Homology.BifunctorShift                 instructions   -11.7%
+ ~Mathlib.AlgebraicTopology.SimplicialNerve               instructions   -14.9%
+ ~Mathlib.CategoryTheory.Comma.StructuredArrow.CommaMap   instructions   -10.1%
+ ~Mathlib.CategoryTheory.Limits.Cones                     instructions    -4.3%
+ ~Mathlib.CategoryTheory.Localization.Trifunctor          instructions    -9.5%
+ ~Mathlib.CategoryTheory.Whiskering                       instructions    -4.3%
```
